name: YouandtheBeanstalk
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beanstalk
des:
Are you ready climb the beanstalk to find your mother a birthday gift above the clouds? We hope you enjoy this Earplay interactive audio fairytale adaptation co-produced with WBUR, Boston's NPR station.

With Earplay, you can enjoy audio stories you play with your voice, featuring voice acting and sound effects like in a radio drama. Experience this exciting new storytelling medium where you become part of the story, interacting with characters to affect how the events unfold.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
